>>> import warnings
>>> with np.testing.clear_and_catch_warnings(
...         modules=[np.core.fromnumeric]):
...     warnings.simplefilter('always')
...     warnings.filterwarnings('ignore', module='np.core.fromnumeric')

...     # np.core.fromnumeric
